Blake Fromkin

New York, NY

I'm a full-stack software engineer with experience in JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, React, Go, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Docker, and AWS. I leverage the creative problem-solving skills I honed as a former Associate Creative Director to tackle engineering challenges and communicate effectively with my teammates.

Most recently, I built Reverb, an event-driven workflow engine that reliably orchestrates complex, multi-step background jobs.

Reverb Case Study Resume

Reverb is an open-source, event-driven workflow engine that orchestrates the logic and infrastructure developers need to build complex asynchronous workflows. It was built with TypeScript, Docker, AWS, Graphile Worker, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and React.

Users define tasks as multi-step functions in their repository, and Reverb handles triggering, executing, retrying, and monitoring them step-by-step.


Read Reverb Case Study
